Uses of Class
jam.data.control.DataControl

Packages that use DataControl
jam.data.control Dialogs for manipulating histograms, gates, scalers, real-time monitors, and data parameters. 
 

Uses of DataControl in jam.data.control
 

Subclasses of DataControl in jam.data.control
 class CalibrationDisplay
          Displays a calibration function.
 class CalibrationFit
          Class to control the histograms Allows one to zero the histograms and create new histograms
 class GainShift
          Class for adjusting the gain of 1d spectra.
 class GateControl
          Class to set 1 D and 2 D gates.
 class HistogramControl
          Class to control the histograms Allows one to zero the histograms and create new histograms
 class Manipulations
          Class for projecting 2-D histograms.
 class MonitorControl
          Reads and displays the monitors.
 class ParameterControl
          Sets and displays the Parameters (data.Parameters.class) used for sorting
 class Projections
          Class for projecting 2-D histograms.
 class ScalerControl
          Reads and displays the scaler values.
